accordion_items.question: Why was the developer angry at the compiler?
accordion_items.answer: Because it kept giving him null points!

accordion_items.question: Why do programmers prefer dark mode?
Why did the developer go broke?
accordion_items.answer: Because he used up all his cache!

accordion_items.question: Why was the JavaScript developer sad?
accordion_items.answer: Because he didn't know how to 'null' his emotions!

accordion_items.question: Why did the database administrator leave his wife?
accordion_items.answer: She had one too many triggers!

accordion_items.question: Why did the CSS developer go to therapy?
accordion_items.answer: Because his styles were not aligned!

accordion_items.question: Why did the QA engineer go to jail?
accordion_items.answer: Because he was caught in a loop hole!

accordion_items.question: Why did the developer go to the beach?
Why was the software developer afraid of the dark?
accordion_items.answer: Because he didn't know how to handle the light mode!

accordion_items.question: Why did the C# developer get locked out of his house?
accordion_items.answer: Because he lost his keys with no reference!

accordion_items.question: Why did the programmer always mix up Halloween and Christmas?
Why did the programmer hang his phone on the wall?
accordion_items.answer: Because he wanted to make a mobile website!

accordion_items.question: Why did the programmer quit his job?
Why was the code like a baby?
accordion_items.answer: Because it had a lot of bugs to be fixed!

accordion_items.question: Why was the developer always cold?
accordion_items.answer: Because he left his Windows open!
